content.question: Which of the following is a way to potentially eliminate one of the greatest threats to the world's mangrove wetlands?

choices.label: Increase desalination to reduce the effects of prolonged drought in mangroves.
Integrate ecologically sound shrimp aquacultural practices with mangrove management.
Construct dams in mangroves to increase sediment load and decrease pollution.
Employ irrigation methods to address potential desertification of mangrove habitats.

content.answer: Integrate ecologically sound shrimp aquacultural practices with mangrove management.
